summary:
Hey! thank you for checking out this savegame and I hope you enjoy playing as Alex! *PLEASE ENDORSE EVERY MOD THAT IS USED THANK YOU*

note I am actually trying to port it to Skyrim SE as we speak but the downside to that is that a lot of mods are not on Skyrim SE nexus and most likely coverwomen will not come to the Skyrim SE n
descriptionHtml:
treevor is a coont

NOTE: you NEED all mods except #5's they are optional 
-INSTRUCTIONS- download and extract the file, go into documents/mygames/skyrim/saves and put the file you just extracted into there instructions from: -REDD2400- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/35515195/?


#1) HAIR, FACE, AND EYES

1) (face) -coverwomen (look 1)- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3563/? AND -fair skin complexion-  http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?

2) (hair) -apachii sky hair- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

3) (eyes) -covereyes- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4869/?

#2) BODY
note he uses all of these he switches in between 

1) -CBBE- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?

2) -UNP- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?

3) -SeveNBase- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?

#3) IDLE ANIMATIONS 

1) -lifelike idle- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59048/?

2) -TBBP- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34713/?

#4) RACEMENU 

1) -racemenu- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?

2) -showracemenu- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33526/?

#5 OPTIONAL MODS

1) -enhanced camera- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57859/? 

2) -familiar faces- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54509/?

3) -alexstrasza follower- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72530/?

4) -cloaks of skyrim- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12092/?
author: Reachy
